name: And We're Back?
description:
Make sure to put both files in the same folder!

This game follows a knight (who might be a chicken) through a series of rooms. Doors take you from one to the next but what if sometimes they don't?

Due to a serious bug late in development, if you need to go back to an earlier level, the buttons were not working and so the game will have to be restarted. I'm sorry for the inconvenience but I really tried everything to fix it.

Feedback and suggestions are more than welcome. This is my first game and it was made for my first Game Jam!

Credits: Font is "Pixels" by Ayden Snider on DaFont.com Everything else is from me (ProphecyOak)
